coloredTexts.text: Normally the larger the weapon, the more powerful it will be, but at the same time slower.
The hard work is the true reward.
What a nice gear you have there Can I take a look?
Gold, iron, diamonds. I can make all good stuff from those.
Always is good have a weapon in hand. Or maybe two.
Magic? Pff, there's nothing better than a big sharpened heavy axe.
If you can't see yourself in the reflection of a sword then it's not sharp enough.
On the battlefield you can only trust your sword!
Weapons made of stone? Who is the madman?
I could be with the grinder all day.
Enchanting weapons? Maybe a flaming sword would be cool.
